args.description: Arguments to pass to the build command

component_source.description: Source of the component that contains the build context

context.description: Docker build context relative to the component root

dockerfile.description: Path to the dockerfile relative to the context

push.description: Configuration specifying if/how to push to a remote registry

account.description: Account that provides access to the registry

name.description: Name of the repository to push to

namespace.description: Namespace to put the image in

tag.description: Tag to apply to the image

target.description: Name of a intermediate build stage to target
